name: PosOrient
description: Positioning & Orientation of footprints in the PCB Editor
description_full:
Positioning & Orientation of footprints in the PCB Editor

- get footprints position and orientation
- work interactively, drag footprints and update data table
- set new position and orientation in the table, update
- save and open position and orientation configuration files
- check log what changed
- gui highlighting and tooltips
